name: FLAPPY FIRE (itch)
description:
Flappy Fire is an addictive 2D game where the player controls a bird that can shoot fireballs by pressing the "f" key. The aim of the game is to guide the bird through a series of obstacles by tapping the spacebar to make it fly higher, while also avoiding collisions with obstacles such as pipes and collecting coins to achieve the highest score possible. If the player finds it hard to cross an obstacle, they can shoot a fireball to remove it.

The game features simple and intuitive controls, allowing players of all ages to enjoy it. With its colorful graphics, catchy soundtrack, and fast-paced gameplay, Flappy Fire is sure to provide hours of entertainment for anyone looking for a fun and challenging gaming experience.
